blam.MOVES_NOPASS: [FRYou may not pass if you have pieces to place.
blam.MOVES_NOPIECE: [FRYou don't have a {{piece}} piece to place.
blam.MOVES_SYNTAX: [FRInvalid move syntax. Enter the size followed by the cell (e.g., 3e4).

INITIAL_UNDO: [FRYou can't undo the initial starting position of the game.
MOVES_GAMEOVER: [FRYou cannot make moves in concluded games
MOVES_INVALID: [FRThe move '{{move}}' is invalid. Please check the rules and try again.
MOVES_SIMULTANEOUS_PARTIAL: [FRIn simultaneous games, both players' moves must be submitted at the same time.

volcano.MOVES_AFTER_ERUPTION: [FRYou may not continue moving after causing an eruption.
volcano.MOVES_DOUBLE_CAP: [FRNothing may be placed on top of a cap.
volcano.MOVES_MUST_ERUPT: [FRYou must continue moving until you cause an eruption.
volcano.MOVES_NOPIECE: [FRYou don't have a {{piece}} piece in your stash to place.
volcano.MOVES_ONE_POWERPLAY: [FRYou may only make one power play per turn.
volcano.MOVES_ONE_SPACE: [FRCaps may only be moved one space at a time.
volcano.MOVES_TOO_FAR: [FRCaps may only be moved one space at a time.
